page.title: 04Family Life in Brewham.
page.content:
It's usually just mum and me at home because my dad is often away with the Navy in{Oman,}in the{Middle East. { When he comes home mum and I go up to{Heathrow Airport}in the{car}to meet him. It's a great joy when he gets home. He usually brings us a present.
He is usually tired for a while but the next day he often does a job, cleaning the garage for instance. Most days we go to the{pub}for{lunch.}The barman likes to chat to dad when he's home.
The next day some of our relations come and we often go to{Stourhead because we all like it there.
